content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

content: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

content: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

content: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

content: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

content: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
author: John D. Rockefeller

content: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
author: Thomas Jefferson

content: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

content: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
author: Bruce Lee

content: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes but they don't quit.
author: Conrad Hilton

content: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

content: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

content: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

content: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

content: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
author: Jim Rohn

content: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
author: Rob Siltanen

content: The way to achieve your own success is to be willing to help somebody else get it first.
author: Iyanla Vanzant

content: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
author: Maya Angelou

content: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

content: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you were better.
author: Jim Rohn

content: Try not to become a man of success, but rather become a man of value.
author: Albert Einstein

content: You don't have to be a genius or a visionary or even a college graduate to be successful. You just need a framework and a dream.
author: Michael Dell

content: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

content: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

content: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

content: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
author: Colin R. Davis

content: Success is a journey, not a destination.
author: Ben Sweetland

content: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
author: W.P. Kinsella

content: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
author: Winston Churchill

content: Success is not the absence of failure; it's the persistence through failure.
author: Aisha Tyler

content: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph.
author: Zig Ziglar

content: Success is about creating value.
author: Candice Carpenter

content: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day-in and day-out.
author: Robert Collier

content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

content: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
author: Zig Ziglar

content: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

content: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
author: Vidal Sassoon

author: Bruce Lee

content: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
author: Colin Powell

content: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

author: Winston Churchill

author: Vidal Sassoon

author: Jim Rohn
